text: Gemini, formerly known as Bard, is a family of large language models developed by Google AI. The models understand and respond to different types of information, such as text, code, images, and sound. It is used to assist with writing emails and stories, creating transcripts of video or audio files, drafting outlines of business documents, searching the web, translating languages, and providing answers to questions. Gemini has many versions for different needs, including business applications and mobile use. It is still in its infancy. == References == Category:Google Category:Generative artificial intelligence
title: Google Gemini
